title: T206 Cobb Bat on PSA 5 FS
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb Bat on PSA 5 FS
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason  Duncan
I was aksed to sell this card for a friend of mine who is changing pace in his collection.  Scans are available upon request.  The card is a T206 Bat on well centered and a crisp clean blood red SC back.  The front has great registration and bold color.  It resides in a PSA 5 holder.  First $2,500 takes it dlvd.

Thanks
Jason
